tickets.subject: Flynn_FW004539_Hyattsville_MD_Site Survey
tickets.ticketdescription: Initial site survey to assess requirements and site conditions.
tickets.first_post_content: Performed site survey. Cable drop locations identified. Need to confirm power requirements.
tickets.last_post_content: Survey completed. 5 cable drops marked. Electrical work will be needed before installation.

tickets.subject: Flynn_FW004539_Hyattsville_MD_P1
tickets.first_post_content: Arrived on site for P1 installation. Begin running cable drops and setting up network closet.
tickets.last_post_content: Completed 3 of 5 drops. Missing necessary junction boxes for 2 remaining drops. Will need to schedule follow-up.

tickets.subject: Flynn_FW004539_Hyattsville_MD_P2
tickets.first_post_content: Installing network equipment and completing remaining cable drops.
tickets.last_post_content: Network closet set up complete. All switches installed. Still waiting on junction boxes for 2 remaining drops.

tickets.subject: Flynn_FW004539_Hyattsville_MD_P3
tickets.first_post_content: Junction boxes arrived. Completing remaining drops and configuring network.
tickets.last_post_content: All drops complete and tested. Network configured and operational. Customer sign-off received.

tickets.subject: Flynn_FW004539_Hyattsville_MD_50 PERCENT BILLING
tickets.first_post_content: Project has reached 50% completion. Issuing partial invoice.
tickets.last_post_content: Invoice #INV-2023-456 issued for 50% of project total.

tickets.subject: Flynn_FW004539_Hyattsville_MD_Revisit 1
tickets.ticketdescription: Revisit to address network connectivity issues.
tickets.first_post_content: Customer reporting intermittent connectivity issues with 2 drops.
tickets.last_post_content: Found and repaired damaged cable in drop #3. Replaced faulty patch panel port for drop #5. All connections now testing properly.
